Interface Controller

All Superinterfaces:
SonarObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
ControllerImpl
public interface Controller extends SonarObject
Controller for field devices, etc.
Author:
Douglas Lau

    • FAULTS

      static final String FAULTS
      Fault conditions. Semicolon-delimited list of fault conditions: `other`, `prom`, `program_processor`, `ram`, `display`, `gps`
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      Long getFailTime()
